column1: Traffic reports will resume Tuesday October 11 at 4:00 p.m.

column3: Bluegrass Pkwy at Exit 59 (US-127) in Anderson Co:
column4: All eastbound lanes are shutdown at Exit 59 (US-127) until further notice.  Traffic is being diverted onto Exit 59.

column3: Bluegrass Pkwy at Exit 59 (US-127) in Anderson Co:
column4: Emergency crews are working to clear an earlier semi fire on the KY river bridge.
Tuesday October 11 at 7 p.m. at Rupp Arena.  Doors open at 5:30 p.m.
Use added caution if traveling downtown this evening and watch for pedestrians.
